# Aquaband Defender – Water Safety Innovation

![Aquaband Defender Prototype](../images/projects/wristband.png){width=400px style="display: block; margin: auto; border-radius: 12px;"}

## Project Overview

Aquaband Defender is a GPS-enabled safety band designed to prevent water accidents among children and  water hobbyists. This project has undertaken a concept paper, feasiblity study, marketing analysis and a presentation for Dragon's Den.

---

## Objectives

- Raise water safety awareness
- Launch in Irish market targeting parents and water enthusiasts
- Achieve first-year sales of 2,500+ units
